name: Bartigo
description:
Bartigo is a living and contiuously developing world filled with thousands of possibilities. Play games with your friends or find new friends from all over the world!



Bartigo is a Online-Party-Game.

  • Minigames like billiards, darts and much more comming soon.
  • Earn items.
  • Hang out in a bar with friends.
  • Have fun with friends.
  • Watch videos on sites like YouTube.
  • Tell us what you want to see in the game
